headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Holiday Gift
content:
Season's Greetings. Enjoy a free Holiday Gift that turns GTA Online into a winter wonderland. Bundle up in seasonal items like Santa hats, snowman masks and more for a limited time. Share your selfies and holiday Snapmatics with new photo filters, borders, facial animations, a meme generator and more.

Update content. Requires latest title update to play. Seasonal items will disappear from your inventory on January 5th.
